title: Build Solano7m E-Commerce App

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that stores and manages product listings (id, name, description, price, image URL, category, stock quantity), supports CRUD operations for products, and persists data across upgrades.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me with the app name of solano7m

acceptanceCriteria: Products can be created, read, updated, and deleted via backend calls.
Product data includes id, name, description, price, imageUrl, category, and stock.
Data persists across canister upgrades.

requirements.text: Implement a shopping cart on the backend that allows adding, updating quantity, and removing items per user (keyed by principal), and returns the cart contents with totals.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add a product with a quantity to their cart.
Users can update the quantity of an item in their cart.
Users can remove an item from their cart.
Cart total is returned correctly.

requirements.text: Implement an order system on the backend where a user can place an order from their current cart, storing order history (order id, items, total, timestamp, status) per user.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: Placing an order clears the user's cart and saves it as a completed order.
Orders include items, total price, timestamp, and a status field.
Users can retrieve their order history.

requirements.text: Build a product catalog page that displays all available products in a responsive grid, with each product card showing image, name, price, and an 'Add to Cart' button. Include category filtering and a search bar.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me with the app name of solano7m

acceptanceCriteria: Products are displayed in a responsive grid (2â€“4 columns depending on screen size).
Each card shows product image, name, price, and an Add to Cart button.
Users can filter products by category.
Users can search products by name.
Adding to cart triggers a visual confirmation.

requirements.text: Build a product detail page that shows full product information (name, description, price, image, stock), allows quantity selection, and provides an 'Add to Cart' button.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a product from the catalog navigates to its detail page.
Full product info is displayed.
Quantity selector is present and constrained by available stock.
Add to Cart button updates the cart.

requirements.text: Build a shopping cart page that lists all cart items with quantity controls (increment/decrement/remove), displays line-item totals and a grand total, and includes a 'Proceed to Checkout' button.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: All cart items are listed with name, unit price, quantity controls, and line total.
Grand total updates dynamically as quantities change.
Items can be removed from the cart.
A 'Proceed to Checkout' button is visible.

requirements.text: Build a checkout page that shows an order summary and a 'Place Order' button. On confirmation, the order is submitted to the backend and the user is shown a success screen with the order ID.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: Order summary lists all items, quantities, and the total.
Clicking 'Place Order' calls the backend and clears the cart.
A success screen is shown with a unique order ID.
User can navigate back to the shop after placing an order.

requirements.text: Build an order history page where authenticated users can view their past orders, including order date, items, total, and status.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me

acceptanceCriteria: Orders are listed in reverse chronological order.
Each entry shows order date, item list, total, and status.
Only accessible when the user is authenticated.

requirements.text: Apply a bold, modern retail visual theme across the entire app using a warm earthy palette (deep terracotta, cream, and charcoal), clean sans-serif typography, generous whitespace, and consistent card-based layouts with smooth hover interactions.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me with the app name of solano7m

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette, typography, and spacing are consistent across all pages.
Cards have hover effects.
The Solano7m brand name is prominent in the header/navbar.
Layout is responsive on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Render the generated hero banner image and logo as static assets in the app header and catalog hero section from frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Create an ecomerce app for me with the app name of solano7m

acceptanceCriteria: Hero banner image is displayed at the top of the catalog page.
Logo is displayed in the navbar.
Images load from /assets/generated without backend calls.

constraints: App name must be displayed as 'Solano7m' throughout the UI.
All backend logic must reside in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not use external payment processors or third-party APIs.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Admin panel for inventory management (initial build).

required: Wide e-commerce hero banner with warm earthy terracotta and cream tones, abstract lifestyle product backdrop with geometric shapes and subtle texture (hero-banner.dim_1400x500.png)
Minimalist wordmark logo for 'Solano7m' in charcoal lettering on a transparent background with a small decorative accent mark (solano7m-logo.dim_320x80.png)
